QuestData.Title: Return of the Highborne?
QuestData.Description: The wax seal on these orders has been freshly broken. You can't read the carefully-penned night elven script, but a small hand-drawn map indicates the nearby ruins. Underneath the map, written in a different language entirely, are a series of runes penned in a metallic, shimmering ink.$B$BAg'tor will no doubt want to see this important piece of intelligence.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Scout's Orders to Ag'tor Bloodfist at the rear gate to Orgrimmar.
QuestData.CompletionText: You found something on one of the bodies, you say? Give it here!
QuestData.RewardText: <Ag'tor squints at the parchment, turning it in the light.>$B$BNo, I can't make sense of it either, but I don't like what I see. Are these arcane runes?$B$BI'll need you to deliver this to an expert.
